item.title: Unnamed Card Game
item.description: Idea Design a two-phase game which starts with a rummy-like and finishes with turn-based combat using only a standard deck of cards. There could be useful aids like a game mat but the game should be entirely playable with just a standard deck.

item.title: Switching to Neovim
item.description: zettelnvim Neovim is an extremely extensible terminal code editor which is a form of the popular Vim editor. Not only does it look extremely cool to use but adept users are able to code extremely quickly.

item.title: The Smartwatch is Not What You Think
item.description: The smart watch is the most effective device for curing your smartphone addiction, full stop. This is a bold and counter-intuitive claim, smart watches are made to keep you connected, arenâ€™t they? That was likely their original design intention.
